price: (Sε moyε saa a) Ɔde mo bͻne no mu bi bεkyε mo, na Wama mo εberε akɔsi εberε a yɛahyε ato hͻ no. Nokorε sε Onyankopͻn berε no so a, yɛntu nhyε da, sε anka monim a.
arabic: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yaghfir lakum min dhunūbikum wayu-akhir'kum ilā ajalin musamman inna ajala al-lahi idhā jāa lā yu-akharu law kuntum taʿlamūna
